articles.description: The viral brothers talk to Newsbeat after an NFT of their viral video from 2007 sells for £538,000.
articles.content:

articles.author: Chloe Morgan, Jessica Green
articles.title: From Holby City to Hollywood! Femail reveals the famous faces who have appeared on the wards - Daily Mail
articles.description: Following the BBC announcement that Holby City is set to be axed in 2022, FEMAIL takes a look at some of the biggest star names who started out on the show - including Sheridan Smith.
articles.content:
Over the last 23 years, the Emergency Department at Holby City Hospital has seen a whole range of famous faces from the acting world rush through its wards.
